ygData.subject: RE: Monk Loot and Modifications (was Re: An idea for t he slow day)
ygData.msgSnippet: I been testing AC for a little while now... the landscapes look nice (great actually if you have the machine to implement full graphics on) but NPC and PC s
ygData.messageBody:
I been testing AC for a little while now... the landscapes look nice (great
actually if you have the machine to implement full graphics on) but NPC and
PC's look ridiculous. They are the ugliest thing I have seen in a game in a
long time. Now granted it is beta, and perhaps things will change. I
certainly hope so for Turbines sake.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Dave [SMTP:kagtuol@...]
> Sent: Saturday, August 28, 1999 2:28 AM
> To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: Monk Loot and Modifications (was Re: [EQ-Monks] An idea
> for the slow day)
>
> From: "Dave" <kagtuol@...>
>
>
> For enhanced graphics, I think there should be an optional download...
> maybe some people would want to download a 300 MB file. I know i would
> want to. Im tired of everyone looking the same anyhow. I hear that in
> Asheron's Call everyone looks much different from each other than they do
> in
> EQ. Maybe the next EQ addon will address this (if there is one, more $
> for
> Verant).
>
> Sleet
> Brell Serilis
>
>
